name: Arcane Trickster
description: Arcane Tricksters enhance their roguish skills with illusion and enchantment magic, weaving spells into stealth and deception.

3.name: Spellcasting
3.description: When you reach 3rd level, you gain the ability to cast spells. You learn mage hand and a limited selection of wizard spells focused on illusion and enchantment.

3.name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
3.description: Starting at 3rd level, you can cast mage hand invisibly and perform additional tasks with it, such as stowing objects or picking locks.

9.name: Magical Ambush
9.description: Beginning at 9th level, if you are hidden from a creature when you cast a spell on it, the creature has disadvantage on any saving throw it makes against the spell this turn.

13.name: Versatile Trickster
13.description: At 13th level, you gain the ability to distract targets with your mage hand. As a bonus action, you can designate a creature distracted by your mage hand to gain advantage on attack rolls against it.

17.name: Spell Thief
17.description: At 17th level, when a creature casts a spell that targets you, you can use your reaction to force the creature to make a saving throw. On a failure, the spell has no effect on you and you can cast it yourself.
